alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Texas, northwestern Hutchinson, Hansford, southeastern Sherman, west central Ochiltree and northeastern Moore Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Sunray, or 17 miles northeast of Dumas, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spearman, Sunray, Gruver, Waka, Morse, and Farnsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
